title: Cloud Desktop
pageDescription: The VDI (Virtual Desktop Infrastructure) virtual desktop system is designed to deliver desktops created on a remote server and operating in a virtualized environment to users.
shortDescription: Delivery of desktops to users on a remote server
metaDescription: Cloud Desktop service for delivering desktops to users on a remote server
markdown: The VDI (Virtual Desktop Infrastructure) virtual desktop system is designed to deliver desktops created on a remote server and operating in a virtualized environment to users.
